problem.script: n=random.randrange(5,10,1)/100 h=random.randrange(20,50,1)/100 insidesqrt= n* n+2* n* h answer= n+ math.sqrt( insidesqrt)
problem.p: A spring-like trampoline dips down $n m when a particular person stands on it. If this person jumps up to a height of $h m above the top of the uncompressed trampoline, how far will the trampoline compress after the person lands?
